troubleshooting.title: GitLab Connector Slow When Listing Large Folders

keywords.indexterm: GitLab takes long to list folders

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When working with a GitLab connection, it takes a very long time to list folders that contain lots of files.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: The default maximum number of item per page when listing contents of folders is 100 per page. Folders that contain thousands of files require a lot of pagination events and the more often pagination occurs, the longer it takes.

steps-informal.p: To reduce the number of required paginations and hence speed up the loading of large folders in GitLab connections, you can set the gitlab.per_page_limit system property to a value greater than the default value of 100 (for example, you could set it to 1000 or greater if your folders contain thousands of resources).
